description: online Search Instructions The collection maybe browsed and searched as whole, by using the ‘Browse’ and ‘Search’ options on the tool bar above. Alternatively, searches and browsing may be confined to individual ANS Departments, by clicking on the relevant link below. If you know the area or period in which you are interested, we recommend using the Departmental search pages. The Greek, Roman, and U.S. collections may be searched by scalable and clickable map, by clicking on ‘Maps’ in the tool bar above. This function is currently under development for other areas of the collection

is_part_of.title: MANTIS: American Numismatic Society's new collection interface

title: online
